PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-18882009-11-26,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PSEP
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Marking Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS MARKING REGULATIONS will allow sufficient time to analyze additional marking options not previously considered, in order to arrive at a new and more stakeholder-appropriate system, including a proposal from the firearms industry to place the information required by international treaties on metallic strips. This proposal seeks to defer the implementation date for one year, to December 1, 2010.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0313 Publication Date: 2009-12-09
AttachmentsAttachment
